Articles.Content:
I tried making a bomb dropping system similar to the one used on a MOAB on a C130 and ended up trying to make a whole C130 (as accurate as I could get) replica. But it ended up not working as I planed and I could not get it air born, i'll leave it here for anyone wanting to get it working or as a nice replica.

Some images to show you:

And a nice download for y'all.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1bplg9rva4w569q/C130%20Bomber.craft

C-130's train all the time where I live, so I see a lot of them.

Looks pretty good, shape wise. However, with two engines it's more like a C-27 Spartan (Link here - Literally a mini-C-130.) than a 4 engine C-130.

Overall, I love it!
Thanks i couldn't fit 2 engines on each side though, I just forgot to mention it. If I did it would make the wings to heavy they probably would just fall off.

Thanks i couldn't fit 2 engines on each side though, I just forgot to mention it. If I did it would make the wings to heavy they probably would just fall off.

That's what I figured - very impressive nonetheless!
Looks great, even with only 2 engines. I also see C-130s a lot where I live, used by the coast guard. Good job!
